subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Though he was not the hitter that Derek Jeter is, the young and scrappy Roger Peckinpaugh served the same role in 1914 as Jeter does today: team captain.
snippet: Though he was not the hitter that Derek Jeter is, the young and scrappy Roger Peckinpaugh served the same role in 1914 as Jeter does today: team captain.
